original_title: Extinct Attractions Club Presents: The Carousel of Progress Story
overview: Join everyone’s favorite Audio-Animatronic family—Father, Mother, daughter Jane (and her unnamed brother), Grandma, Grandpa, and, of course, Cousin Orville—for a very entertaining and enlightening “spin” through time.
tagline: At Every Turn We'll Be Making Progress
title: Extinct Attractions Club Presents: The Carousel of Progress Story
